EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Bruce, Great to hear from you and congrats on the new job! Your official hire date 7.29.2002 -2.21.2005 (then gap in employment) new hire date 3.30.2005 -11.16.2005 (gap in employment) 1.9.2012-2.17.2012. Thanks for the complement on the photo, I just got new ones taken! J Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Bruce Hankins [mailto:bhankins@me.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2012 8:29 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Background check Hi Sara, I'm filling out information for a background check online with CERTIPHI. My Dashboard says MBO Exec since 01/09/2012. Can you tell me the actual date I started? I accepted a permanent employment position. By the way, you have a great picture on Linkedin. Best regards, Bruce Hankins http://about.me/bruce.hankins <http://about.me/bruce.hankins> Sent from my iMac
